headline: A Look At Ecolab (ECL) Valuation As Shares Trade Near Recent Highs
summary: Ecolab (ECL) is back on many watchlists after a recent price move, with the stock last closing at $273.54. You might be weighing how that level lines up with its recent returns. See our latest analysis for Ecolab. The recent 1 day share price return of 0.94% and 1 month share price return of 3.77% sit alongside a 1 year total shareholder return of 18.15%, which suggests that momentum has been gradually building rather than fading.
